revised_title: Bloch Waves and Laue Zone Effects in High Energy Electron Diffraction: A Reformulation of the Theory
tldr: The author reformulates the Bloch wave theory to account for the variation of the crystal potential along the zone axis in high energy electron diffraction. By using perturbation methods, the author studies the effects of this variation on the diffracted waves and provides a more accurate understanding of the diffraction process in perfect crystalline slabs.
